description: This inn, which has been serving food since the early 19C, boasts a warm atmosphere with a rustic feel. The beautiful garden makes a delightful setting in fine weather, while the cuisine focuses on traditional dishes from Friuli, such as “frico” (potato, onion and cheese fritter) and cured ham.
